T02D3123:220a-0: @220a ` // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D3123:220a-2: * // bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni /
T02D3123:220a-5: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na phreng ba dang mchog sbyin /
T02D3123:220a-6: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D3123:220a-7: snying gar gnas pa'i po ti'i phyag mtshan no //
T02D3123:220a-9: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3123:220a-10: na bza' dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3123:220a-11: nyi ma'i 'od dang gdan can te sngar bzhin no //
T02D3123:220a-12: bsil ba'i tshal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3123:220a-14: // / aom a'a: pram ma h'a pra ti s'a re h'um /
T02D3123:220a-15: aom a'a: mam ma h'a m'a y'u ri h'um /
T02D3123:220a-16: aom dh'um ma h'a sa ha sra pra marda ni h'um /
T02D3123:220a-17: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a mantra aa nu sa ri h'um /
T02D3123:220a-18: aom a'a: h'um ma h'a sh'i ta ba ni h'um /
T02D3123:220a-19: slob dpon chen po dze ta ri dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
T02D3123:220a-20: dang po dbus su lngas mchod /
T02D3123:220a-22: yang phyogs mtshams kyi dbus su mchod /
T02D3123:220a-25: tha mar yang dbus phyogs bzhir gtang rag gi mchod pa bya /
T02D3123:220a-26: de rnams la 'byor pa yod na mchod pa lnga chan bcu gsum gyis mchod do//
T02D3123:220a-27: de ltar byas pas ni be te bcu gsum dgos so //
T02D3123:220a-28: nas la sogs pa bzhi pos bskor zhing bsreg pa lan gnyis kyis cho ga ste /
